events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request because the customer received an incorrect product size.
Support agent John Smith has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect jacket size.
Hello! I’m John from customer support. Sorry to hear about the issue with your jacket. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new and unopened; I just realized the size is wrong when I tried it on.
Thank you for the details. We will approve your refund and send you a prepaid return label shortly so you can return the jacket hassle-free.
Thanks for the quick response and the convenient return option. I appreciate your help with this refund.
Your refund case is now resolved. The prepaid return label has been emailed to you, and your refund will be processed once we receive the jacket.
Just checking in to confirm you were able to send the jacket back using the prepaid label and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I sent the package yesterday and received confirmation from the postal service. Thank you again for your assistance.
The refund has been completed and the case is now closed. Please contact us if you have any future concerns.
We have sent a short survey to understand your satisfaction with the resolution of your refund case. Your feedback is appreciated.
